meanings.definition: A projection on the end of a piece of wood for insertion into a mortise to make a joint.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully crafted the tenons to fit perfectly into the mortise.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the tenons are aligned properly before hammering them into place.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the tenons as tiny diving boards into the pile of leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like tenons, seamlessly connecting the different perspectives in the room.
meanings.sent5: The tenons, like puzzle pieces, interlocked to create a sturdy bond between the two wooden beams.
